history.proof: intros plp a la ls H1 H2 H3 H4. intros. sauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros plp a la ls H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

ctx: intros plp a la ls H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros plp a la ls H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment plp : pl_path a : ad la, ls : prec_list H1 : pl_path_incl plp ls H2 : pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls H3 : plp <> pl_path_nil H4 : pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls) d : preDTA tl : term_list n : nat H : pl_path_recon d tl plp H0 : pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) n Unable to unify "exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp la /\\ pl_path_recon d tl plp" with "liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) tl".

original: intros plp a la ls H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def. intros H5 d tl n H6 H7. split. - intros H8. apply pl_path_rec_equiv_0 with (d:=d) (pl:=la) (tl:=tl). + auto. + apply H5. + auto. - intros H8. apply pl_tl_length_rec_3 with (a:=a) (hd:=a) (la:=la) (ls:=ls) in H6. + apply H6. + apply H7.
